description.author: Salesforce
text: A component that provides a tooltip with a help text feature using a button icon and a popover container to display additional information.

elements.name: buttonIcon
elements.description: Represents an icon button that triggers the tooltip display.

elements.name: tooltipContainer
elements.description: Represents the container for the tooltip content.

elements.name: tooltipContent
elements.description: Represents the content of the tooltip provided through a named slot.
